text: Ussi ko pukarna haq hai. Jo log auron ko iss kay siwa pukartay hain woh unn (ki pukar) ka kuch bhi jawab nahi detay magar jaisay koi shaks apney dono hath pani ki taraf phelaye huye ho kay uss kay mun mein parr jaye halankay woh pani uss kay mun mein phonchney wala nahi inn munkiron ki jitni pukar hai sab gumrahi mein hai
